data.title: Broadway & Children's Theatre
data.meta_description: Theatre in the heart of the Fort Worth, TX, Cultural District. Live Broadway, Children's Performances, Concerts, and Education in the Theatre Arts.
data.text:
Million Dollar Quartet

September 7-15

Million Dollar Quartet tells the true story of the famed recording session that brought together rock ‘n’ roll icons Elvis Presley, Johnny Cash, Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins. See that fateful December night in Memphis come to life with an irresistible tale of personal and professional struggles, promises, secrets, betrayals and celebrations at the start of these legends’ careers.

Live at The Apollo

September 17-October 5

THE REID CABARET THEATRE | Countless iconic careers got their start at Harlem’s Apollo Theater. The stars of The Reid Cabaret sing the work of luminaries like Ella Fitzgerald, Billie Holiday, Stevie Wonder, and more. This show is suitable for most audiences.

R & H’s Cinderella

October 11-27

Experience the beloved musical adaptation of the classic fairy tale, including enchanting music, a Fairy Godmother and a glass slipper or two! When her wicked stepmother forbids it, Cinderella must find a way to attend the ball and meet Prince Charming – luckily her Fairy Godmother is there to lend a spell.
